verses.text: \w Wherefore|strong="H0199"\w*, \w Job|strong="H0347"\w*, I pray thee, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* my \w speeches|strong="H4405"\w*, and \w hearken|strong="H0238"\w* to all my \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.

Behold, now I have \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, my \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* in my \w mouth|strong="H2441"\w*.\f + \fr 33.2 \ft in my mouth: Heb. in my palate\f*

My \w words|strong="H0561"\w* \add shall be of\add* the \w uprightness|strong="H3476"\w* of my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*: and my \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* shall \w utter|strong="H4448"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* \w clearly|strong="H1305"\w*.

The \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w God|strong="H0410"\w* hath \w made|strong="H6213"\w* me, and the \w breath|strong="H5397"\w* of the \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* hath given me \w life|strong="H2421"\w*.
If thou \w canst|strong="H3201"\w* \w answer|strong="H7725"\w* me, set \add thy words\add* in \w order|strong="H6186"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me, stand \w up|strong="H3320"\w*.

Behold, I \add am\add* according to thy \w wish|strong="H6310"\w* in \w God’s|strong="H0410"\w* stead: I also am \w formed|strong="H7169"\w* out of the \w clay|strong="H2563"\w*.\f + \fr 33.6 \ft wish: Heb. mouth\f*\f + \fr 33.6 \ft formed: Heb. cut\f*
Behold, my \w terror|strong="H0367"\w* shall not make thee \w afraid|strong="H1204"\w*, neither shall my \w hand|strong="H0405"\w* be \w heavy|strong="H3513"\w* upon thee.

Surely thou hast \w spoken|strong="H0559"\w* in mine \w hearing|strong="H0241"\w*, and I have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of \add thy\add* \w words|strong="H4405"\w*, \add saying\add*,\f + \fr 33.8 \ft hearing: Heb. ears\f*
I am \w clean|strong="H2134"\w* without \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w*, I \add am\add* \w innocent|strong="H2643"\w*; neither \add is there\add* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* in me.
Behold, he \w findeth|strong="H4672"\w* \w occasions|strong="H8569"\w* against me, he \w counteth|strong="H2803"\w* me for his \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*,
He \w putteth|strong="H7760"\w* my \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* in the \w stocks|strong="H5465"\w*, he \w marketh|strong="H8104"\w* all my \w paths|strong="H0734"\w*.
Behold, \add in\add* this thou art not \w just|strong="H6663"\w*: I will \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* thee, that \w God|strong="H0433"\w* is \w greater|strong="H7235"\w* than \w man|strong="H0582"\w*.

Why dost thou \w strive|strong="H7378"\w* against him? for he giveth not \w account|strong="H6030"\w* of any of his \w matters|strong="H1697"\w*.\f + \fr 33.13 \ft he giveth…: Heb. he answereth not\f*
For \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w speaketh|strong="H1696"\w* \w once|strong="H0259"\w*, yea \w twice|strong="H8147"\w*, \add yet man\add* \w perceiveth|strong="H7789"\w* it not.

In a \w dream|strong="H2472"\w*, in a \w vision|strong="H2384"\w* of the \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, when \w deep|strong="H8639"\w* sleep \w falleth|strong="H5307"\w* upon \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, in \w slumberings|strong="H8572"\w* upon the \w bed|strong="H4904"\w*;

Then he \w openeth|strong="H1540"\w* the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, and \w sealeth|strong="H2856"\w* their \w instruction|strong="H4561"\w*,\f + \fr 33.16 \ft he…: Heb. he revealeth, or, uncovereth\f*

That he may \w withdraw|strong="H5493"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \add from his\add* \w purpose|strong="H4639"\w*, and \w hide|strong="H3680"\w* \w pride|strong="H1466"\w* from \w man|strong="H1397"\w*.\f + \fr 33.17 \ft purpose: Heb. work\f*

He keepeth \w back|strong="H2820"\w* his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* from the \w pit|strong="H7845"\w*, and his \w life|strong="H2416"\w* from \w perishing|strong="H5674"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H7973"\w*.\f + \fr 33.18 \ft from perishing: Heb. from passing\f*

He is \w chastened|strong="H3198"\w* also with \w pain|strong="H4341"\w* upon his \w bed|strong="H4904"\w*, and the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of his \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* with \w strong|strong="H0386"\w* \add pain:\add*

So that his \w life|strong="H2416"\w* \w abhorreth|strong="H2092"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, and his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w dainty|strong="H8378"\w* \w meat|strong="H3978"\w*.\f + \fr 33.20 \ft dainty…: Heb. meat of desire\f*

His \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* is consumed \w away|strong="H3615"\w*, that it cannot be \w seen|strong="H7210"\w*; and his \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \add that\add* were not \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* stick \w out|strong="H8192"\w*.
Yea, his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* draweth \w near|strong="H7126"\w* unto the \w grave|strong="H7845"\w*, and his \w life|strong="H2416"\w* to the \w destroyers|strong="H4191"\w*.

If \w there|strong="H3426"\w* be a \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* with him, an \w interpreter|strong="H3887"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* among a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, to \w shew|strong="H5046"\w* unto \w man|strong="H0120"\w* his \w uprightness|strong="H3476"\w*:

Then he is \w gracious|strong="H2603"\w* unto him, and \w saith|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Deliver|strong="H6308"\w* him from going \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w pit|strong="H7845"\w*: I have \w found|strong="H4672"\w* a \w ransom|strong="H3724"\w*.\f + \fr 33.24 \ft a ransom: or, an atonement\f*

His \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* shall be \w fresher|strong="H7375"\w* than a \w child’s|strong="H5290"\w*: he shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of his \w youth|strong="H5934"\w*:\f + \fr 33.25 \ft a child’s: Heb. childhood\f*

He shall \w pray|strong="H6279"\w* unto \w God|strong="H0433"\w*, and he will be \w favourable|strong="H7521"\w* unto him: and he shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* his \w face|strong="H6440"\w* with \w joy|strong="H8643"\w*: for he will \w render|strong="H7725"\w* unto \w man|strong="H0582"\w* his \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*.

He \w looketh|strong="H7789"\w* upon \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, and \add if any\add* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, I have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, and \w perverted|strong="H5753"\w* \add that which was\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w*, and it \w profited|strong="H7737"\w* me not;\f + \fr 33.27 \ft He…: or, He shall look upon men, and say\f*

He will \w deliver|strong="H6299"\w* his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* from \w going|strong="H5674"\w* into the \w pit|strong="H7845"\w*, and his \w life|strong="H2416"\w* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w light|strong="H0216"\w*.\f + \fr 33.28 \ft He…: or, He hath delivered my soul, etc, and my life\f*

Lo, all these \add things\add* \w worketh|strong="H6466"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w oftentimes|strong="H6471"\w* with \w man|strong="H1397"\w*,\f + \fr 33.29 \ft oftentimes: Heb. twice and thrice\f*

To bring \w back|strong="H7725"\w* his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* from the \w pit|strong="H7845"\w*, to be \w enlightened|strong="H0215"\w* with the \w light|strong="H0216"\w* of the \w living|strong="H2416"\w*.
Mark \w well|strong="H7181"\w*, O \w Job|strong="H0347"\w*, \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto me: hold thy \w peace|strong="H2790"\w*, and I will \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*.

If thou \w hast|strong="H3426"\w* any thing to \w say|strong="H4405"\w*, \w answer|strong="H7725"\w* me: \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*, for I \w desire|strong="H2654"\w* to \w justify|strong="H6663"\w* thee.
If not, \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto me: hold thy \w peace|strong="H2790"\w*, and I shall \w teach|strong="H0502"\w* thee \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*.
